fr.iut.orderProvider.utils

Class ConfigPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iut.orderProvider.utils.ConfigPath

  • public class ConfigPath
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was made to simplify the configuration of the different paths used by Voce/Sphins4 and the Simplifier
    Author:
    Michel

      Default value is "voce.config.xml"
      void setGrammarName(java.lang.String grammarName)
      Set the name of the grammar file to use without the ".gram" extension
      The file is usually a .gram file which use the JSGF format

      Set the path of the folder which contains the grammar file
